sections.heading: Short title.Section 76-26-2 - Definitions.Section 76-26-3 - Agricultural workforce development program created; general provisions; rulemaking.
sections.text:
This act [76-26-1 to 76-26-3 NMSA 1978] may be cited as the "New Mexico Agricultural Workforce Development Program Act".

History:Laws 2019, ch. 236, § 1.

Effective dates.— Laws 2019, ch. 236 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 14, 2019, 90 days after the adjournment of the legislature.
